info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: Beauty and the Beast
collection.openText: But the curse continues, never removed.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The success rate for the task was at the highest when Repression was performed on $0. Repression was effective in PE-box production, but it greatly diminished the health of $0.
When tasks other than Repression was performed on $0, $0's health improved.
Several Repression tasks were performed on $0. $0 collapsed with a weak moan. After $0 was gone, #0, the employee who carried out the task, suffered an odd phenomenon. Soon, a new $0 was born.
